vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.29;
son of: Lamech (H3929H);
father of: Shem (H8035), Ham (H2526) and Japheth (H3315)
Also named: Nōe<\i> (Νῶε "Noah" G3575)
§ Noah = "rest"
son of Lamech, father of Shem, Ham, and Japheth; builder of the ark which saved his family from the destruction of the world which God sent on the world by the flood; became the new seminal head of mankind because his family were the only survivors of the flood
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Lámec; descendiente de Set; padre de Sem, Cam, Jafet
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
挪亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "休息"
拉麥的兒子, 閃、含、雅弗的父親; 他建造方舟使得他的家人能逃過上帝用洪水毀滅世界的災難;
成為人類新里程碑的代表, 因為他的家庭是洪水災難中僅存的人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
挪亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "休息"
拉麦的儿子, 闪、含、雅弗的父亲; 他建造方舟使得他的家人能逃过上帝用洪水毁灭世界的灾难;
成为人类新里程碑的代表, 因为他的家庭是洪水灾难中仅存的人
